sentences.en: About 600 people throughout the world suffer from the incurable FOP.
sentences.cn: 全球约有600人确诊患有该症,暂时未有医治方法.

sentences.en: To investigate CT features and value of diagnosis of focal organizing pneumonia ( FOP ).
sentences.cn: 探讨局灶性机化性 肺炎 的CT特点及诊断价值.

words.tran_cn: 花花公子；过分讲究衣饰或举动的人

trans.tran_cn: <贬>（讲究衣着和外表的）纨袴子弟，花花公子
trans.tran_en: a man who is very interested in his clothes and appearance - used to show disapproval
